abstract: Forget the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index or the Dow Jones industrial average; the latest gauge of Wall Street performance — at least on Madison Avenue — is the K.B.S.& P. Client Stock Index.
snippet: Forget the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index or the Dow Jones industrial average; the latest gauge of Wall Street performance — at least on Madison Avenue — is the K.B.S.& P. Client Stock Index.
lead_paragraph: Forget about the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index or the Dow Jones industrial average. The latest gauge of Wall Street performance — at least on Madison Avenue — is the K.B.S.& P. Client Stock Index, The New York Times’s Stuart Elliott writes.

headline.main: Agency Combines Clients’ Stocks for Mini-Mutual Fund
